description: This table holds the claim adjustment reason code information for the claim.  Each record holds the set of reason codes and amounts for one coverage at either the claim or service line level.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the Claim Info record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CAS_GRP_CD
columns.description: This item holds the group code for a claim adjustment reason code. Group codes from both claim level and line level adjustments will be stored in this item.

columns.name: CAS_RSN_CD
columns.description: This item holds a claim adjustment reason code. Both claim level and line level reason codes will be stored in this item.

columns.name: CAS_AMT
columns.description: This item holds the amount for a claim adjustment reason code. Amounts from both claim level and line level adjustments will be stored in this item.

columns.name: CAS_QTY
columns.description: This item holds the quantity for a claim adjustment reason code. Quantities from both claim level and line level adjustments will be stored in this item.

columns.name: BB_AMT_TYPE
columns.description: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) provided by the Beneficiary Claims Data API (BCDA), for determining the adjudication amount type.
